docs.snippet: The United States on Monday urged Thailand to limit the role of its powerful military after the ruling junta gave military officers new police-like powers to arrest and detain criminal suspects....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States on Monday urged Thailand to limit the role of its powerful military after the ruling junta gave military officers new police-like powers to arrest and detain criminal suspects.

headline.main: US Criticizes New Police Powers for Thai Military Officers

docs.snippet: Julián Castro, the secretary of housing and urban development, said landlords cannot deny housing just because an applicant has a criminal history....
docs.lead_paragraph: Julián Castro, the secretary of housing and urban development, said landlords cannot deny housing just because an applicant has a criminal history.
docs.abstract: Federal Housing and Urban Development Dept says private landlords who impose blanket bans on renting to people with criminal records are violating Fair Housing Act and are vulnerable to lawsuits and penalties for discrimination; Real Estate Board of New York officials say they will issue guidance to members across state on HUD’s interpretation of law.

headline.main: Federal Housing Officials Warn Against Blanket Bans of Ex-Offenders
headline.print_headline: Federal Housing Officials Warn Against Blanket Bans of Ex-Offenders

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Real Estate Board of New York

docs.snippet: In New York, trying to do something about spreading the new urban bounty....
docs.lead_paragraph: In New York, trying to do something about spreading the new urban bounty.
docs.abstract: Paul Krugman Op-Ed column cites New York City's push toward  loosening of building restrictions, combined with inclusion of affordable housing in new developments, as promising solution that could help make cities more accessible to all socioeconomic classes.
